dev_env_documentation_integration.overview:
The project online Dev Env mode references sdlc/Dev Env.md for comprehensive setup guidance.
See ../../sdlc/shared/env-setup-workflow.md for: - When to reference Dev Env.md - How to use Dev Env.md - What to look for in Dev Env.md
dev_env_documentation_integration.mode_behavior: Follow Dev Env.md Integration guidance from shared pattern file. Reference sdlc/Dev Env.md for project-specific setup instructions.
